Label.en: Your working life may be harder than usual this week, but you're learning important skills that will advance you up the food chain.

Label.en: Meanwhile, your career is going through a lot of changes. Take it one step at a time for greater rewards.

Label.en: The present planetary configuration helps you to set the necessary boundaries - whatever is right for you - for your health. Structure needs to be flexible but very, very strong. Try to enjoy the process of integrating structure into your life.

Label.es: The present planetary configuration helps you to set the necessary boundaries - whatever is right for you - for your health. Structure needs to be flexible but very, very strong. Try to enjoy the process of integrating structure into your life.

Label.en: You will benefit from eating fish instead of meat as often as possible. Enjoy the lighter things in life: fresh vegetables, bean curd, soy products and herbal tea. Even if you make substitutes only once a week, you will benefit in the long run from your effort.
Label.fr: Egalement, cela serait bien de manger plus de poisson et de remplacer certaines boissons par une tisanne go√ªteuse.
Label.es: You will benefit from eating fish instead of meat as often as possible. Enjoy the lighter things in life: fresh vegetables, bean curd, soy products and herbal tea. Even if you make substitutes only once a week, you will benefit in the long run from your effort.
